schema_description: This schema is a schema for extracting data from a letter of employment.

schema_definition.title: Employment Letter Salary Extraction
schema_definition.description: This schema is used to extract the employee's name and salary details from an employment letter.

employee_name.description: The full name of the employee as stated on the employment letter.

employee_salary.description: The salary details of the employee including amount and frequency.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the salary offered to the employee.

frequency.description: The frequency with which the employee is paid, such as annually, monthly, biweekly, weekly, or hourly.
